welcome_message_body: Welcome to St. John's, Canada! Get ready to experience the charm of our colorful row houses, vibrant music scene, and stunning coastal views. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.address: Main Highway, Goulds (at Doyle's Rd), St. John's NL
